text:
Building Radar | Software Engineer | Munich, Germany | ONSITE

Building Radar is a fast growing, well-funded, Munich-based start-up where we work at the intersection of Data Mining and Machine Learning to provide world's construction information in real-time to our customers.

We are currently looking to expand our team with the following roles:

- Backend Engineer, ideally with DevOps experience, to work on our Data Pipeline (Python, Docker/Kubernetes, Cassandra, Elasticsearch, Redis)

- Front End Engineer or Full Stack Engineer to work on our Product (Angular, Pyramid, Elasticsearch, Postgres)

See more information: https://buildingradar.com/about-us/careers/ or email me directly (see profile)
